main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Washington D.C. on August 2, 1959, behaving erratically before disappearing.
interesting points: The object initially appeared as a straight line blinking irregularly,It moved rapidly in vertical and horizontal directions before slowing down and disappearing,The sighting lasted approximately 2-3 minutes,The object was described as a white light with no sound or exhaust,There were five other witnesses who appeared solid and reliable
witness description: Five reliable observers and one pilot
